name: Haunted House Party
description:
Get ready for an All Hallow's Eve party in this short, sweet game!

You'll decorate your place, gather snacks, pick pumpkins & more in this adorable game, & do it all to a charming & haunty soundtrack.

✨🕸️🔮🍬🧁🎃🐈‍⬛👻✨

Music & game design by Ryan. https://theambientfield.com/
Concept & words by Lisa. https://lisaciccarello.com/
Graphics (& graphics inspiration) by huxmay. https://www.creativefabrica.com/designer/huxmay/
